review: ANother great product from Amazon. I love that I don't have to stack one more appliance on my TV stand. plugs nicely into the back of the TV and works great. I bought one for our second TV and considering one for the office.
author: Mac

review: Not as good as the Fire TV.  The UI stutters a lot, as does content.  I notice that it seems to occur after watching for a while, and the unit itself gets quite warm.  This may be a defective unit, or common to the design itself.  In all fairness, my 2 Fire TV devices are hard-wired, while this unit is wireless.  I do have other wireless devices that do not have any issues with streaming.If you have an available Ethernet connection and can spend the extra $, spring for the full version.
author: Brent L. Bordelon

review: Ive had the fire tv for a while. I love it. When the firestick went on sale suring prime day i picked the stick up.  Works just as good dont notice any difference.  We use this is our main tv for shows and movies. We cut cable out and its been the best decision weve made. Highly recommend!
